page.title: 15Media
page.content: Most households buy a daily paper while a little over half have a Sunday newspaper.About 50% buy the local "Bucks Free Press" but 2 others are delivered free.Magazines and monthlies purchased are generally connected with hobbies.Young adolescent girls buy more magazines than boys of a similar age. Serials are the most popular TV programme,"Dallas" being the favourite. Adults enjoy comedy programmes like "Last of the Summer Wine" and older children "The Young Ones".Football and snooker are by far the most watched sports by all ages.Nature programmes such as "The World About Us" and the David Attenborough series are favoured by adults while "Wild Track" is popular with children. More than half the 175 families in our survey use a video recording machine but hire tapes infrequently.
